document_title: Primary essential hypertension: Causes, symptoms, treatment
subsection_content:
Genetics is considered the leading risk factor for primary hypertension. Besides, the risk of disease will increase if you:
Overweight or obese; Have a sedentary lifestyle; Diet high in salt, low in potassium; Smoke; Drinking alcohol in excess (more than 1 drink/day for women and 2 drinks/day for men); Often uncontrollable stress
